content: console.log("我是主控台")document.write ("我是HTML文件")後面是程式碼執行結果 console.log("我是主控台")document.write ("我是HTML文件")什麼是javascript 函數 function print(){message = "HELLO cat"console.log(message)}function print1(){message = "HELLO 1"console.log(message)}function print2(){message = "HELLO 2"console.log(message)}function add1(arg1){result = arg1+1return(result)}

title: cal
content: #scr{ width:93% ; background-color: #9e9e9ea8;; } .common{ background-color: #80808080; width: 22% ; padding: 0px; border: none; } .special{ background-color: #5c87c3cf; width: 22%; padding: 0px; border: none; } .special.equ{ background: url(http://i47.tinypic.com/2ni0ahd.png) no-repeat; background-size: cover;}   function donumber(e){ scr.value=scr.value+e.value } function clearscr() { scr.value="" } function doequ() { temp= eval(scr.value) scr.value = temp.toPrecision(15) }
